title: Gasperini’s pre-Como press conference - AS Roma
snippet: December 14, 2025 · Copy · On the eve of Roma v Como, Gian Piero Gasperini spoke to the media at Trigoria. Read what the coach had to say. It’s going to be a great game, with two coaches who have clear ideas. What type of match are you expecting? What are your thoughts on Cesc Fabregas?

title: Gasperini previews Celtic clash - AS Roma
snippet: December 10, 2025 · Copy · Gian Piero Gasperini spoke to the media on the eve of Roma's Europa League Matchday 6 meeting with Celtic. This is what the Giallorossi boss had to say.

title: Gasperini: 'Roma won't settle for 4th, but we'd be happy with it'
snippet: ROME, ITALY – DECEMBER 15: Gian Piero Gasperini, Head Coach of AS Roma, hugs Cesc Fabregas, Head Coach of Como 1907, prior to the Serie A match between AS Roma and Como 1907 at Stadio Olimpico on December 15, 2025 in Rome, Italy.

title: Gasperini: “Our best game at the Olimpico” - AS Roma
snippet: December 15, 2025 · Copy · Gian Piero Gasperini was interviewed by Sky Sport after the game against Como. Here's what the boss had to say: Let's start with Matias Soulé. I saw you and Cesc Fabregas having a friendly chat. He recognised that Roma deserved to win this game and was full of praise for Soule and the way he played.

title: Gasperini: ‘Roma won’t settle for fourth, but we’d be happy with it’ - Yahoo Sports
snippet: Tue, December 16, 2025 at 1:30 a.m. UTC· ... Gian Piero Gasperini feels the 1-0 victory over Como was Roma’s ‘best home performance of the season’ and assures he wouldn’t ‘settle for fourth place, but I’d be very happy with it.’
